member.name: M:OrderService.Models.JsonHelper.BuildJsonFromNVC(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Converts a NameValueCollection into a properly formated JSON string,
member.param: Keys must be in form of "sourceOfFunds.provided.card.expiry.month" using "." to represent the levels of nesting of the JSON structure

members.member:
Converts a JSON string into a NameValueCollection representing the JSON structure
JSON string to convert
NameValueCollection, key names represent the JSON nesting using "." delimeters "sourceOfFunds.provided.cardDetails.card.expiry.month"

member.name: M:OrderService.Models.JsonHelper.TraverseDictionary(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Process and recursively keep calling itself to process all levels of the JSON string
member.param: String that keeps track of what to prefix each key with to maintain JSON nesting
member.returns: NameValueCollection of all the nested JSON parameters
